EmailTemplate.description: Auto-send followup email template to primary Lead's email address
EmailTemplate.name: Primary Project Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in setting up an RH Business account. We're processing your application for an account, and wanted to confirm the predominant focus of your business so that we can make sure that the right team supports you.
How would the majority of the projects you worked on over the last 18 months be classified (select one)? *Hospitality projects (hotels, restaurants, bars, spas) *Commercial projects (offices, retail spaces, educational institutions) *Residential projects working with single- or multi-family residential builders/developers *Residential interior design projects working directly with homeowners
Sincerely, RH Contract Membership
